text: (napiye! Nirakarikkum ivarkalai nokki) ‘‘vanattil iruntum pumiyil iruntum unkalukku unavalippavan yar?'' Enru ketpiraka. (Atarku avarkal patil kuruvatenna?) ‘‘Allahtan'' enru (nire) kuri ‘‘meyyakave nerana valiyil iruppavar allatu pakirankamana tavarana valiyil iruppavar ninkala allatu nama?'' Enrum ketpiraka
